• Are birthing partners ever 
asked to leave the room? 
Why?
• Can I move around in 
labour	and	find	my	own	
position for the birth?
• What services are 
provided for sick babies?
• Who will help me 
breastfeed my baby?
• Who will help me if I 
choose to formula feed?
• How long am I likely to be 
in hospital?
• What are the visiting hours?
